New Records: Virat Kohli equals Sachin Tendulkar's record of 49 ODI hundreds
Ravindra Jadeja equalled Sachin Tendulkar's tally of ODI five-fors
Marco Jansen's 9.4-0-94-1 is the most expensive spell by a South African at a World Cup
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli made a century on his birthday
India bowled South Africa out for 83
India beat South Africa by 243 runs
Jadeja's five wickets included Rabada, Jansen, Maharaj, Miller, and Klaasen
Shami took key wickets including van der Dussen and Markram
Siraj dismissed De Kock early in the innings
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and chose to bat
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed his honor in equaling Tendulkar's record and his emotional connection to the achievement
Kohli reflected on the importance of batting deep and the partnership with Shreyas Iyer
Kohli mentioned the significance of the moment happening on his birthday
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ngidi suffered a potential hamstring injury during the match
India's bowling attack was described as irresistible
India topped the table with a game still left to play
